mdRecord.dcterms:title: Light Up the Sky [by] Moss Hart
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the Aug 19, 1975 performance of Moss Hart's Light Up the Sky. Directed by Owen Phillips. Set by Bennet Averyt. Costumes by Sigrid Insull. Lighting by Michael Dalzell. 43rd Season.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
